snippet: Sunday newspaper circulation increased by a surprisingly robust 5 percent, according to the Audit Bureau of Circulations, while daily circulation increased less than a percent.
abstract: Sunday newspaper circulation increased by a surprisingly robust 5 percent, according to the Audit Bureau of Circulations, while daily circulation increased less than a percent.

headline.main: Small Gain in Newspaper Circulations, Aided by Digital Subscriptions
headline.print_headline: Small Gain in Daily Newspaper Circulation
